SVGAttributeContentStyleType.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The contentStyleType attribute specifies the style sheet language for the given document fragment on the svg element.

remarks.para: This language is used for all instances of style that do not specify their own styling language, such as the style attribute that is available on many elements. The value specifies a media type, per MIME Part Two: Media Types [RFC2046].

-MIME Part Two: Media Types [RFC2046]
-style element
-style attribute
